verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's already done (2x)
The victory is won
The battle is over
It's already done

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have overcome (2x)
The victory is won
The battle is over
We have overcome

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Satan's on the run (2x)
The victory is won
The battle is over
Satan's on the run

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I have been redeemed (2x)
The victory is won
The battle is over
I have been redeemed
